text: Alexandra Myšková (born 4 April 1922) is a Czech-born Norwegian actress, educator and theatre director. Her career began in 1949 and she retired in 2000. Myšková was born in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She was also a theatre teacher. Her best known roles were in The Fifth Horseman Is Fear (1965), Hledá se táta (1961), Romeo, Juliet and Darkness (1960), Zkouška pokračuje (1959), and Distant Journey (1949). Myšková turned 100 in 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:Living people Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech television actors Category:Czech stage actors Category:Czech theatre directors Category:Czech educators Category:Norwegian movie actors Category:Norwegian television actors Category:Norwegian stage actors Category:Norwegian educators Category:Actors from Prague Category:Centenarians
title: Alexandra Myšková
